title: Central location in Peabody. 2 Bed, 2 Bath! Stop by for a tour!
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments', 'Located at: 1 Avalon Dr Peabody, MA 01960', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2 bath | 1791 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $3530 - $4492/month', 'Call Today!', '(844) 800-3206', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'With a premier address on the North Shore, Essex is home to a wonderful collection of Peabody apartments that come in one- and two-bedroom floor plans with loft and townhome options.', 'Each of these amazing apartments come with luxury features like a private patio or balcony, central air-conditioning, spacious closets and in-unit washer and dryers.', 'Members also get to take advantage of a range of community amenities, such as a landscaped barbecue and picnic area, playground, sparkling swimming pool and planned resident activities.', 'In a nutshell, our apartments in Essex County have everything you need to live comfortably in Massachusetts.', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '✓ 10 Minutes From the Coastline', '✓ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '✓ Close to North Shore Mall', '✓ Easy Access to Maine', '✓ Easy Access to Route 1 and 128', '✓ High-speed WiFi Internet Available', '✓ Online Payments Available', '✓ On-Site Management Team', '✓ Pet-Friendly Community', '✓ Resident Clubhouse', '✓ Beautifully Landscaped Barbecue and Picnic Area', '✓ Community-Sponsored Social Events for Residents and Friends', '✓ Complimentary Package Acceptance Service', '✓ Free WiFi Available in Common Areas', '✓ Located Near Public Transportation', '✓ Smart Rain Sensors Used to Reduce Water Consumption', '✓ Sparkling Swimming Pool with Sundeck', '✓ State-of-the-Art Fitness Center with Cardio and Strength Equipment', '✓ Sustainable Lighting Techniques to Reduce Energy Consumption', 'Apartment Features!', '✓ All Apartments with In-Unit Washer/Dryer', '✓ Bright Spacious Floor Plans with 9 Foot or Vaulted Ceilings', '✓ Central Air Conditioning', '✓ Disability Access', '✓ Frost-free refrigerator', '✓ Fully-Equipped Kitchens Include Dishwashers and Breakfast Bars', '✓ Plush Wall to Wall Carpeting', '✓ Private Balcony and Patio', '✓ Separate Dining Rooms In Select Apartments', '✓
